Interface PropLanguage<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:

    public interface PropLanguage<T>
extends Property<T>

    Property with language and a text-based value

    • Method Detail

      • getLanguage

        Language getLanguage()

        LANGUAGE To specify the language for text values in a property or property parameter.

        Examples: SUMMARY;LANGUAGE=en-US:Company Holiday Party LOCATION;LANGUAGE=no:Tyskland
